content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

School debate
content.question: What does Ms. Suzuki say about her classmates?

choices.label: They support a new kind of uniform.
They like to express their own tastes.
They think clothes should be fun.

content.answer: They like to express their own tastes.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
